title: Crew Show! (Defender 110, Mach-E, a One Take goes weird)
description:
Matt Farah and Zack Klapman discuss their recent drives: the Defender 110 400E, the Mustang Mach-E, and Alpina XB7. Plus, a weird story about a One Take fan. And of course, Q and A!
